title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       From performances especially for children, to the Junior Ranger Activity Booklet - activities for kids are offered throughout the year. All activities are free, except performances at Theatre-in-the-Woods.               Performances at Theatre-in-the-Woods   Theatre-in-the-Woods performances run from late June to early August, Tuesday through Saturday at 10:30 am.            Summer Ranger Programs   Traditionally two programs are offered daily after Theatre-in-the-Woods shows and are available from late June through mid August.        Become A Junior Ranger   Learn what makes Wolf Trap so special by completing the booklet and associated activities and earning a badge or patch.               Let's Move With Music!   Encourages children and families to be active and make healthy lifestyle choices through music and movement.         Flat Stanleys & Flat Rangers   Flat Rangers travel across the country by mail and can visit America's National Parks. Receive pictures and information about their travels.            Additional programs are available for the whole family outside of the summer season, such as backstage tours of the Filene Center.
